title: Student-Centered English Teaching Methods Workshop for Enhancing 21st-Century Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English education experience and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: A course focused on developing instructional design competencies applicable to real-world practice for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design an English lesson plan utilizing student-centered learning (SCL) strategies.
Through project-based assessments, learners can develop instructional modules that reflect 21st-century competencies (creativity, critical thinking, collaboration).
Learners can apply methodologies to design smartphone-based learning activities in limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
